Title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
Genre: Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi
Writer: William Hanna (characters), Joseph Barbera (characters), James Gunn
Actors: Freddie Prinze Jr., Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Linda Cardellini
Plot: The Mystery Inc. gang must save Coolsville from an attack of their past monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to take down the gang.
